articles.title: Homeland Security says a fraud investigation is underway in Minneapolis
articles.description:
The action comes after years of investigation that began with the $300 million scheme at the nonprofit Feeding Our Future, for which 57 defendants in Minnesota have been convicted.

The post Homeland Security says a fraud investigation is underway in Minneapolis appeared first on Boston.com.
